S04n407:8: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī punareva bhagavantametadavocat– adyāsmākaṃ bhagavan deśaya tvamavalokiteśvarasya guṇaviśeṣam ||
S04n407:22: eteṣu parvatarājeṣvekaikaṃ lokadhātuṣu śakyate mayā parvatarājānāṃ palāni vā palaśatāni vā palasahasrāṇi vā palakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi vā saṃkhyāmapi kalāmapi gaṇanāmapi śakyate mayā kulaputra gaṇayitum |
S04n407:23: na tu kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya śakyate puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum |
S04n407:24: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra śakyate mayā paramāṇurajasāṃ pramāṇamudgṛhītum,
S04n407:25: na tu kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya śakyate puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum |
S04n407:26: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra śakyate mayā mahāsamudrasyaikaikaṃ binduṃ gaṇayitum,
S04n407:27: na tu kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya śakyate mayā puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum |
S04n407:28: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra śakyate mayā śīrṣavanasyaikaikāni patrāṇi gaṇayitum,
S04n407:29: na tu kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya śakyate puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum ||
S04n407:30: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra sumeruḥ parvatarājo bhūryarāśirbhavet |
S04n407:32: caturdvīpanivāsinaḥ strīpuruṣadārakadārikādayaḥ sarve te lekhakā bhaveyuḥ |
S04n407:36: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin dvādaśa gaṅgānadīvālukopamāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāścīvarapiṇḍapātraśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ samupasthitā bhaveyuḥ |
S04n407:39: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin avalokiteśvaraḥ anekaiḥ samādhiśataiḥ samanvāgataḥ |
S04n407:78: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra krakucchando nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān |
S04n407:79: tena kālena tena samayena ahaṃ dānaśūro nāma bodhisattvo'bhūvam |
S04n407:80: tadā etasya tathāgatasya puraḥ sthitvā īdṛśamavalokiteśvarasamantabhadrayoḥ samādhivigraho mayā dṛṣṭaḥ |
S04n407:82: yadā samantabhadro bodhisattvo vajrodgataṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpede,
S04n407:86: yadā samantabhadro vicchuritaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpede,
S04n407:88: yadā samantabhadra ākārakaraṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpede,
S04n407:90: yadā samantabhadro bhadrarājaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpede,
S04n407:91: tadā avalokiteśvaraḥ sāgaragambhīraṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpede |
S04n407:92: yadā samantabhadraḥ siṃhaviṣkambhitaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpede,
S04n407:94: yadā samantabhadro varadāyakaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpede,
S04n407:100: atha krakucchandastathāgatastametadavocat–alpaṃ tvayā kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya pratibhānaṃ dṛṣṭam |
S04n407:101: yādṛśamavalokiteśvarasya pratibhānaṃ tādṛśaṃ tathāgatānāṃ na saṃvidyate |
S04n407:102: īdṛśaṃ mayā kulaputra krakucchandasya tathāgatasya sakāśācchrutam ||
S04n407:103: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat–deśayatu me bhagavān kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ mahāyānasūtraratnarājaṃ yena vayaṃ dharmarasenāpūryamāṇāḥ saṃtṛptāḥ bhavema |
S04n407:108: īdṛśānāṃ pāparatānāṃ sattvānāṃ tadapi kāraṇḍavyūho mahāyānasūtraratnarājaḥ sarvapāpaparimokṣaṇaṃ kurute ||
S04n407:109: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat–kathaṃ jānāmyahaṃ bhagavan kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ mahāyānasūtraratnarājaṃ sarvapāpaparimokṣaṇaṃ kurute?
S04n407:110: bhagavānāha–asti kulaputra sumeroḥ parvatarājasya dakṣiṇapārśve saptabhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairmalanirmalau tīrthau parikalpitau |
S04n407:114: evameva kulaputra idaṃ kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ mahāyānasūtraratnarājaṃ sarvapāpāni dahati |
S04n407:116: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin varṣākālasamaye sarvāṇi tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatayaḥ sarve nīlābhi(rūpā) bhavanti |
S04n407:117: atha śatamukho nāma nāgarājaḥ bhavanādavatīrya sarvāstā tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatīrdahati |
S04n407:118: evamevāyaṃ kulaputraṃ kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ mahāyānasūtraratnarājaṃ sarvapāpāni dahati,
S04n407:121: ya imaṃ kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ mahāyānasūtraṃ ratnarājaṃ śroṣyanti |
S04n407:122: na te kulaputra pṛthagjanā iti vaktavyāḥ |
S04n407:124: teṣāṃ ca maraṇakāraṇasamaye dvādaśa tathāgatā upasaṃkramya āśvāsayanti–mā bhaiṣīḥ kulaputra |
S04n407:131: evaṃ kulaputra teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ sukhamaraṇaṃ bhaviṣyati |
S04n407:132: athāvalokiteśvaro bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte prakrāntaḥ |
S04n407:134: ta ca devā nāgā yakṣā gandharvā asurā garūḍāḥ kinnarā mahoragā manuṣyāmanuṣyāḥ prakrāntāḥ ||
S04n407:135: yadā te prakrāntāstadāyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat–deśayatu me bhagavānasmākaṃ śikṣāsaṃvaram |
S04n407:139: mārocayitavyaṃ śuddhayate bhadanta nānāvāsaṃ na ca yatra nānāvāse'sthīni saṃvidyante |
S04n407:145: kiṃ bahunā? bhikṣavo duḥśīlena bhikṣuṇā nānāvāsaṃ na kartavyam,
S04n407:148: duḥśīlānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ śīlavatāṃ dakṣiṇīyāṇāṃ madhye āvāso na dātavyaḥ |
S04n407:153: atha khalvāyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat–katame kāle bhagavannīdṛśādakṣiṇīyā bhaviṣyanti?
S04n407:154: bhagavānāha–tṛtīye varṣaśatagate mama parinirvṛtasya tathāgatasya īdṛśādakṣiṇīyā bhaviṣyanti,
S04n407:157: te sāṃghikaṃ mañcapīṭhaṃ vaṃśikopabimbopadhānakaṃ śayanāsanaṃ asatparibhogena paribhokṣyante |
S04n407:158: ye ca sāṃghikopacāre uccāraṃ prasrāvaṃ kurvanti,
S04n407:159: te vārāṇasyāṃ mahānagaryāmuccāraprasrāve gūḍhamṛttikodare prāṇino jāyante |
S04n407:164: hīnendriyā dagdhasthūṇākṛtibhirasthipatravaducchritaiḥ svakeśaromapraticchannaiḥ parvatodarasaṃnibhaiḥ sūcīchidropamamukhaiḥ kāye īdṛśaṃ te duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti |
S04n407:175: evaṃ te bahūni varṣaśatāni kāyikaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti |
S04n407:177: te dvādaśa kalpān raurave mahānarake upapadyante |
S04n407:184: tadā bhikṣavaḥ karmavāyavo vānti yena te mṛtāḥ purūṣāḥ punareva jīvanti |
S04n407:186: tataḥ teṣāṃ karmopagānāṃ karmavaśānāṃ mahatī jihvā prādurbhavati |
S04n407:188: evaṃ te bahūni varṣaśatāni bahūni varṣasahasrāṇi bahūni varṣaśatasahasrāṇi nārakaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti |
S04n407:190: tataste yamapālapuruṣā gṛhītvā ca tasya jihvāyāṃ sūcīśatasahasraṃ vidhyanti |
S04n407:196: evaṃ parikramatāṃ teṣāṃ trayaḥ kalpāḥ parīkṣīyante |
S04n407:205: ye śīlavanto guaṇavantaḥ prajñāvantastairbhikṣava imāni śikṣāpadāni mayā prajñaptāni dhārayitavyāni |
S04n407:206: asatparibhogena bhikṣavo na paribhoktavyaṃ sāṃghikaṃ vastu agnighaṭopamam |
S04n407:211: na tu sāṃghikasya vastunaḥ pratikāraṃ kartuṃ śakyate ||
S04n407:219: āyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā prakrāntaḥ |
S04n407:220: atha te mahāśrāvakāḥ svakaṃ svakaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ prakrāntāḥ |
S04n407:221: te ca devā nāgā yakṣā gandharvā asurā garuḍāḥ kinnarā mahoragā manuṣyāḥ,
S04n407:226: te ca bodhisattvāḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti ||
S04n407:230: ye dharma hetuprabhavā hetusteṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat |
S04n407:231: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ ||
